TopicTitle: [1.0.2] Crash on EVA. Log and save file attached

Articles.Content:
Repro steps

Load the save file included in the crash dump zip link at end of this report

EVA Val from the MK3 pod

Immediately hit space to let go and R for RCS

Quickly translate to the left (J) or right (L)

Often causes a crash in Sphereshape.cpp

Link to crash dump on [mega.nz](https://mega.nz/#!g4wBnQQR!xdxvBVAWbMBj2iRVDHi9-f2WdOHSjMhp30Ye2oBdPoY)
idPhobos, please delete your partDatabase.cfg and try again.
Deleted partDatabase.cfg still possible to repro, approx one in ten attempts cause a crash
